venue.name: The Asgard Irish Pub and Restaurant

item.description:
Hello Internet Marketers,
Here's a GREAT event if you can make it. I will be hosting Justin with my friends on the AMA Boston Social Media Team. Justin Levy is one of the TOP social media experts in the country!

This event will have a $5 charge, BUT will include a FREE drink at a cool Cambridge venue and you'll see an excellent presentation on the latest happenings in Social Media!

That should keep all you cocktail hour/ networkers happy.

**You MUST to go through the AMA EVENTBRITE LINK below to actually sign up for the event!**

EventBrite Sign up HERE

Join the Boston Internet Marketing Meetup and the American Marketing Association Boston Social Media team for a great first-of-fall tweetup. Justin Levy of New Marketing Labs, whose eponymous blog is hailed by AdAge as one of the world's 350 top marketing blogs, will give a presentation with his always informative take on the cutting edge of social media marketing.

Heading back to work after Labor Day? What a bummer!
Ease back into your business routine with #BIMM for a relaxing evening of learning, networking, and socializing with your peers in the convivial atmosphere of the Asgard Irish Pub & Restaurant on Mass Ave. in Cambridge, right in the heart of MIT land.

Follow this event on Twitter with the hashtag #amabtu or #BIMM

Ticket includes one free drink.

Garage parking at the University Park/Hotel garage is available for an additional $5 with restaurant validation.

You MUST use this link for the actual sign up & payment Sign up for Justin Levy HERE=
item.how_to_find_us: We will have a private room for the presentation
item.name: Justin Levy and the Cutting Edge of Social Media
